title: Sidebar
description: Add configuration distributed among all ASAB microservices

smtp.title: SMTP Server
smtp.description: Configuration for the SMTP server to send emails from the system.

host.title: Host
host.description: Specify the domain name or IP address of your SMTP server.

user.title: User
user.description: Enter your SMTP server username. Use 'apikey' as the username if API key authentication is required.

password.title: Password
password.description: Enter the password for the SMTP server. If using an API key, enter the key here.

from.title: From
from.description: Set default sender email address for this system.

subject.title: Subject
subject.description: Set default email subject for this system. It will be used if no specific subject is available.

ssl.title: Use SSL/TLS encryption
ssl.description: Enable SSL/TLS encryption for secure email transmission.

starttls.title: Use STARTTLS
starttls.description: Enable STARTTLS to upgrade an unencrypted connection to a secure connection if available.
